scripts.bump-publish: npm whoami && cd packages/mandarina && npm version patch && npm publish && cd ../mandarina-antd && npm version patch  && npm publish && cd ../mandarina-cli && npm version patch  && npm publish  && cd ../mandarina-server && npm version patch  && npm publish
scripts.publish: npm whoami && cd packages/mandarina  && npm publish && cd ../mandarina-antd && npm publish && cd ../mandarina-cli  && npm publish && cd ../mandarina-server && npm publish
